Class FPS

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.Filter

it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.videofilters.fps.FPS
public class FPS extends VideoFilter
This class implements FFmpeg's "fps" video filter.

  • Method Details

    • setFPS

      public void setFPS(@NotNull @NotNull String fps) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the "fps" parameter's value.
      Parameters:
      fps - The given "fps" parameter's expression. THis expression must be recognized by FFmpeg.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given expression is not valid

    • setStartTime

      public void setStartTime(int start_time)
      This method sets the "start_time" parameter's value.
      Parameters:
      start_time - The given "start_time" value.

    • setRound

      public void setRound(@NotNull @NotNull String round) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the "round" parameter's value.
      Parameters:
      round - The given "round" parameter's value. This value cannot be null or an empty string, and it must be allowed by FFmpeg.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given value is null, an empty string, or it is not allowed by FFmpeg

    • setEOFAction

      public void setEOFAction(@NotNull @NotNull String eof_action) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the "eof_action" parameter's value.
      Parameters:
      eof_action - The given "eof_action" paramter's value. This value cannot be null or an empty string, and it must be allowed by FFmpeg.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given value is null, an empty string, or it is not allowed by FFmpeg
